#include <cstdio>



using namespace std;

 

int main(){

    int T,N,S,X;

    
    scanf("%d",&T);

    
    while(T--){

        scanf("%d",&N);

        
        X = 0;

        
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++){

            scanf("%d",&S);

            S/=(i+1);

            X=(X^S)&1;

        }

        
        if(X==0) printf("BOB\n");

        else printf("ALICE\n");

    }

}
